summary: Stabilize the app for launch: fix profile loading error, ensure all content/pages load reliably, and add a Contact Us option with the provided email.
known_issues: Users see error: "Failed to load your profile. This may be a temporary issue."

existing_features.title: Fix the startup error "Failed to load your profile. This may be a temporary issue." by ensuring authenticated users can successfully fetch (and if needed initialize) their caller profile on first login, including brand-new users who have no existing profile yet.
Add a visible "Contact Us" option in the authenticated app UI that opens the userâ€™s email client to email wholesalensrealestate@gmail.com (e.g., via a mailto: link).

Improve launch reliability by adding user-facing recovery paths when critical startup queries fail (actor initialization and profile fetch), including a support pathway that points users to the new Contact Us email when startup errors persist.

Apply a cohesive, launch-ready visual theme polish across the authenticated shell and startup screens (typography, spacing, and a warm real-estate/ledger feel), keeping the current branding and avoiding introducing new product features.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a 'Contact Us' section/link that emails wholesalensrealestate@gmail.com
Improve app reliability/performance so everything loads correctly and is launch-ready for going live
